title: Whereas wee are informed, that divers merchants, strangers, & others, have lately brought into this kingdom several peices [sic] of Dutch coyne, commonly known by the name of new lyon dollars, stamped with a lyon rampant on the one side ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Essex.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1672-1677 : Essex)
publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,
